title: Wealth of a nation
creator_contributor_role: United States Information Agency, production company

description: Illustrates that individual expressions of freedom of action and thought in all areas of life - social, economic and political - are evidence of the strength and progress of a nation. Citizens of all walks of life are shown in pursuit of their own area of thought and action.
